ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry, but I *totally* disagree with you.  Something HAS to be done about the farming that goes on.  Too many guilds and assholes sit around camping GREEN
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry, but I *totally* disagree with you. Something HAS to be done
about the farming that goes on. Too many guilds and assholes sit around
camping GREEN MOBs so that they can get yet another item to sell at
exorbitant prices. In my opinion, the new code is EXCELLENT and just what
is needed. Why do you have to get that 2nd item "just in case?" Go get it
again or buy it when you NEED it, not "just in case." There are too many
campers for "just in case" scenarios. I say that the new patch is exactly
what is needed.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath

> From: "Scott Murph" <smurphy@...>
>
> Hi all,
>
> First I need Brad McQuaid's E-mail address, if you have it,
> please post it.
>
> I'm not one to start a campaign and have never tried so, as they
> say this is
> a first.
>
> I'm not sure how many of you keep up with changes that are
> getting ready to
> be made to the game, most are great and well needed, but one has
> me a little
> worried. Its the change to help control the Camping in the game.
> Now don't
> get me wrong this need to be looked at and fixed and I think they
> are on the
> right path, but I have one big issue with it... read what he has to say at
> http://eqss.stratics.com/ June 3rd. Go to the 2nd set of red text titled
> Anti-Camping Update from Verant and come back here to hear what I have to
> say.
>
>
> O.K. So now you have read it. I'm sure you have you own idea how this is
> going to affect you, but here is my issue with this. Limiting it
> to one item
> is bad in this way, I am not a camper that sits for hours to get
> an item to
> sell, I hunt to get my item and stay so my group gets what they came for
> too. Because these items are hard as hell to get ( had to sit 3
> days to get
> a Blood Stained tunic) if I happen to see another for sell, I'm
> going to buy
> it so I can have a spare. Why do you need a spare, you ask?
> Simple. Bodies
> still vanish and Varent HATES (taking 4 days and massive mailing
> to get) to
> restore bodies from backup tape. Bodies still vanish for no good
> reason and
> they want to give 25th and higher level people crap replacement
> kits. There
> are legitimate ways to loose your body too. Deep lava pits to name one.
> We should be allowed to keep a spare of some thing in the bank if we wish.
> Brad's plan would be great if it allowed you to have two of the
> item and no
> more until you sold or lost one of them.
>
> Help me show him that two is the way to go with this. Camping by super
> powerful people so they can sell tons of these items because there is a
> false supply and demand needs to be dealt with... allowing us to
> have two of
> a lore item will be just as good as allowing only one in this matter. But,
> allowing two will help protect you from spending hours if not
> days replacing
> item when lost. That item could be as close as the bank.
>
> Any feedback would be gladly accepted, but please post it, do not send
> directly to me.
>
> I thank you in advance for your help.
>
> Scott
>
> For the great changes coming soon check out
